TEXT: A shelled parasite who preys on overconfidence. NL Consumes opponents' will through impenetrable armor and debilitating debuffs.
NL You arm a pit, ready to fire...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL Join us, fruit.
